sqlGroup.name: system
sqlGroup.sql: select m.ModuleID,m.Caption,m.CssClass,m.URL from sys_moduleinfo m where m.Type=0 and m.intState=1

select distinct a.AppID,a.AppName,a.Desc,a.ICON_URL,a.WEB_URL from app_baseinfo a left join app_corpassign ca on ca.AppCode=a.AppCode where (ca.CorpID=? or a.blnDefault=1) and (a.WEB_URL is not null) and a.intState=1
